data.Title: Sr. Director of Information Technology, Cyber Security, HRIS and eDiscovery
data.Location: Los Angeles County, California, United States

positions.Title: Sr. Director of Information Technology, Cyber Security, HRIS and eDiscovery
positions.Description:
Sr. Director of Information Systems: Develop and implement IT strategies, oversee projects, manage the IT team, maintain security measures, handle vendor contracts, and ensure compliance.

Cybersecurity: Identify and mitigate risks, implement incident response plans, design secure infrastructure, monitor threats, create policies, and educate employees.

HRIS: Manage HRIS operations, analyze data, integrate with other systems, customize features, train staff, and conduct system audits.

eDiscovery: Manage eDiscovery projects, consult clients, lead the team, ensure data integrity, maintain compliance, and communicate effectively.

Geographical areas covered : North America (USA, Canada) Latin America, Asia and Europe (EU).

Skill Sets includes the following:

*IT Budget Management and Development
*Global Network and Enterprise Cyber Security
*eDiscovery and Relativity One 
*Information Security and Compliance - GDPR (EU), CCPA (CA)
*End to end email Encryption system
*Electronic Data Interchange E-commerce System
*Coupa Procure to Pay System
*Hyper V (Virtualization System)
*Cisco DUO Multi Factor Authentication System
*Rapid 7 IDR (SIEM)
*Microsoft Advance Threat Protection
*Sophos MTR Security Operations Center System
*Avanan SAAS Inline Protection
*Checkpoint Sandblast Security
*Enterprise DLP - Data Loss Prevention System
*HRIS - Global ADP Workforce Now System
*Celergo - ADP Global Payroll System
*Profit OKR system - Objectives Key Results
*Cornerstone Learning, Development and Compensation System
*SAP Success Factor System
*Engagedly Talent Management System
*Oracle Planning and Budgeting - PBCS Hyperion System
*Microsoft Office 365
*Microsoft Azure Enterprise System
*Microsoft Sharepoint and Teams Collaboration System
*Microsoft Co-Pilot Integration M365
*Relatvity eDiscovery and Compliance System
*Box & Dropbox Business - File Hosting System
*Fresh Service Help Desk and Asset Management System
*Artificial Intelligence Integration in Cyber Security
